Welcome to Pokémon IQUII!\nHere it is how it works!Through the \'Pokedex\' section you can catch and save Pokemon on your device. The saved Pokemon will be shown in the \Pokemon\' section. You can also view their stats by interacting with them, even if internet is currently not available. Note that the app is translated in both Italian and English language, choose your favorite one!
